imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Romantic hero banner image with warm sunset tones and silhouettes (hero-banner.dim_1200x600.png)
- Heart icon for like/match actions in modern style (heart-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Message bubble icon for chat interface (message-icon.dim_48x48.png)
- Profile placeholder avatar with neutral aesthetic (profile-placeholder.dim_200x200.png)

existing_features.title: Create a user profile system where users can register and create profiles with basic information including name, age, bio, and interests
Implement a profile browsing interface where users can view other users' profiles with their information and photos
Create a matching system where users can express interest in other profiles and see mutual matches
Implement a messaging interface where matched users can send text messages to each other
Design a modern, romantic visual theme with warm colors, elegant typography, and a welcoming layout that creates an inviting atmosphere for connection and relationship-building
